my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable success stories began when Vignesh Graphics approached me to develop a customized ERP system. Their key requirements were: Automated quotation generation via WhatsApp Work order creation Job status updates through WhatsApp Accounts and stock management Waste tracking and Complete accounts integration We delivered the entire solution in just 2 months. The client was extremely happy and shared that they had previously spent a lot of money with multiple software providers but never got a working solution. Our product not only met but exceeded their expectations. As a result, they referred 2 more projects to us — both of which are now actively ongoing. A similar experience happened with Arun Catering. We built a complete solution tailored to their workflow, and they too were impressed and gave us 2 more referrals. These success stories show how delivering value and staying committed leads to lasting relationships and continuous growth through referrals — something I truly value through BNI.
